title: Mistaken Island (Pilbara)
text:
Mistaken Island is an uninhabited <a href="island">island</a> in the <a href="Dampier%20Archipelago">Dampier Archipelago</a>, in the <a href="Pilbara">Pilbara</a>, <a href="Western%20Australia">Western Australia</a>.
Its area about 10 hectares. It is connected to <a href="East%20Mid%20Intercourse%20Island">East Mid Intercourse Island</a>, and thence to the mainland, by a <a href="causeway">causeway</a>/bridge.
The island is adjacent to the Dampier <a href="salt%20evaporation%20pond">salt evaporation pond</a> and has been used as a salt port by <a href="Dampier%20Salt">Dampier Salt</a> since 1972. Over 3.5 million tonnes are exported annually, with the bulk of this going to industrial use.
